hero.japaneseText2: Build faster, smarter, and more cost-effective with our expert team.

introduction.title: SKILL BRIDGE
introduction.subtitle: A Bridge Connecting Japanese Companies and Vietnamese IT Talent A Platform that Supports Challenges
introduction.description1: SkillBridge is a business matching service specialized in offshore development in Vietnam. In Japan, hiring engineers is becoming increasingly difficult, and companies are struggling to secure skilled talent.
introduction.description2: Through collaboration with experienced Vietnamese engineers, SkillBridge provides high-quality IT talent while significantly reducing costs.
introduction.description3: We aim to solve the serious issue of IT talent shortages in Japanese companies and create a future where working with global talent is a natural part of every business.

merits.title: - Merit -
merits.subtitle: To facilitate the future development of Japan The benefits provided by SKILL BRIDGE

merit1.title: Assign Top Talent
merit1.description: We can assign highly skilled engineers who specialize in specific fields such as AI, blockchain, and mobile app development.
benefits: By securing experienced developers and BrSE, we ensure smooth project progress and deliver outstanding results.

merit2.title: Cost Efficiency without Quality Trade-off
merit2.description: Significant cost savings compared to domestic development (30-50% reduction).
benefits: Access to high-quality talent at competitive rates.
Transparent cost management with clear contract structure (MSA + Sub-contract), making it easy to scale resources as needed.

merit3.title: Smooth Communication & Flexible Engagement
merit3.description: Supported by Bridge SEs and a standardized contract/engineer management system.
benefits: Minimized risks related to language, culture, and process gaps through platform-based standardization.
Flexible engagement models: hire individual engineers, full teams, or request project consulting according to client needs.

challenges.title: SKILL BRIDGE Solves the Challenges of Offshore Development

challenge1.title: Offshore development costs...
challenge1.description: Offshore development costs, once an advantage, have become similar to domestic costs due to intermediaries and management fees
challenge1.solution: Achieving Remarkable Cost Performance - SkillBridge aims to restore the cost advantage by providing high quality at reasonable prices in Vietnam

challenge2.title: Communication with foreign engineers...
challenge2.description: Difficulties in smooth communication due to cultural and language differences, leading to delays and quality inconsistencies
challenge2.solution: Japanese BrSEs Ensuring Smooth Progress - Experienced Japanese SEs bridge communication gaps and provide technical/project management

challenge3.title: Concerned about...
challenge3.description: Concerns about the quality of deliverables and the difficulty in selecting reliable offshore development teams/engineers
challenge3.solution: Zero Concerns with Carefully Selected, Trusted Partners - SkillBridge's strict selection process for Vietnamese partners, focusing on skills, achievements, and human qualities

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Clear Communication, Successful Projects
solutions.subSubtitle: Japanese SEs Lead Offshore Development to Success through Direction
solutions.description: Communication plays a critical role in system development projects, especially across different languages, cultures, and time zones, to prevent misunderstandings and delays.

solution1.title: Appropriate Task Allocation Based on Technical Understanding
solution1.description: Japanese SE staff ensure accurate task allocation based on technical understanding

solution2.title: Quick Communication Support
solution2.description: Japanese SE staff facilitate quick and accurate communication for smooth project progress

solution3.title: Quality Management and Reviews
solution3.description: Japanese staff participation ensures quality standards and supports continuous improvement

solution4.title: Support for Legal and Contract Procedures
solution4.description: SkillBridge's expertise in Vietnam's legal system ensures smooth contract procedures

solution5.title: Progress Management with Time Zone Awareness
solution5.description: Time zone differences are managed for efficient task allocation and collaboration

solution6.title: Smooth Project Handover Support
solution6.description: Support for project handover, knowledge transfer, and operation manual preparation
